member.name: D3D12_PLACED_SUBRESOURCE_FOOTPRINT
member.summary: Describes the footprint of a placed subresource, including the offset and the D3D12_SUBRESOURCE_FOOTPRINT.

member.name: D3D12_PLACED_SUBRESOURCE_FOOTPRINT.Offset
member.summary: The offset of the subresource within the parent resource, in bytes. The offset between the start of the parent resource and this subresource.

member.name: D3D12_PLACED_SUBRESOURCE_FOOTPRINT.Footprint
member.summary: The format, width, height, depth, and row-pitch of the subresource, as a structure.
